content: dotty cashmere cowl by miyoko cancro dotty cashmere cowl a k a one skein wonder cowl just a skein of luxury yarn to knit a cowl you would wear all the time pattern notes gauge blocked this cowl is worked in the round 22 sts x 32 row = 4 10 cm in stockinette stitch yarn ** take a time to swatch sport weight tools 1 skein of the plucky knitter plucky cashmere 100% cashmere 285 stich marker 1 tapestry needle yards / 260 m 105g approx 260 yards / 235 m finished measurements sample shown in one hit wonder 20 / 51 cm circumference x 13 / 33 cm height from rolled top to bottom needle us 4 3 50 mm 16 circular needle abbreviations or needle to obtain gauge co cast on bobble bind off k knit st s stitch es pm place marker p purl 1 instructions with long tail cast on method co 112 sts pm and join to work in the round ** i like a rather snug cowl feel free to change the number of co stitches by a multiple of 4 if you think 20 circumference is too tight for you rolled edge k all sts 4 rounds p all sts 1 round dotty pattern round 1-3 k all sts round 4 *k3 p1 repeat from * to end round 5-7 k all sts round 8 k1 *p1 k3 repeat from * to last 3 sts p1 k2 work rounds 1-8 15 times total work rounds 1-3 once rolled edge p all sts 1 round k all sts 4 rounds bobble all sts loosely ** i alternated regular bind off and elastic bind off every other stitch block the cowl and wear enjoy pattern copyright © miyoko cancro miyokomeow on ravelry the pattern is for personal only 2
